pages.about: About Us - Our Team of Professionals Open mobile menu About us Services Contacts About us Our measurers will tell you in detail about all the details and advise you on the best options. Our designer will create the most beautiful project for you, taking into account your preferences. Our installers put their heart and soul into their work to provide you with quality repairs. Our goal is to make your apartment such that you would be happy to return to it. We can confidently say that your satisfaction is our priority. We take on all your wishes and strive to exceed your expectations. We offer a full range of apartment renovation services, with attention to every detail. Our team of experts will help you choose the best finishes, furniture and glazing options to create your ideal space. We value your time and comfort, so we provide a personal manager who will provide full support for your repair. Our interior designer, taking into account your wishes, will create a visualization of your balcony so that you can make your dreams come true. We strive to create for you a cozy and beautiful apartment that will become an integral part of your family harmony. Let us make your housing dream a reality. Why choose us? On-site calculation You will find out the final cost of repairs during the measurement. Guarantee Our work is guaranteed for 3 years Selection of suppliers We work with 12 companies selling building materials, ready to provide discounts below the market Cleaning as a gift After completing all the work, our company will organize post-repair cleaning of your apartment. Leave everything as it is and Old interior and furniture: Outdated apartment design and old furniture can create impression of outdated housing. Aesthetic defects: Defects on the walls, ceilings or floors can spoil the overall appearance of the apartment, making it look sloppy. Poor lighting: Outdated fixtures and insufficient lighting can make a room feel less welcoming and comfortable. Insufficient energy efficiency: Old windows and doors can be inefficient in terms of insulation, leading to higher heating costs. Limited Functionality: Outdated heating, ventilation and electrical systems can limit the functionality and comfort of an apartment. Change everything and Modern design and furniture: Updating the interior using modern design solutions and stylish, functional furniture. Repair and finishing of walls, ceilings and floors: Removing defects, painting and tiling walls, laying new floor coverings to create a fresh and neat look. Intelligent lighting: Installation of modern lamps with the ability to adjust brightness and color temperature to create a comfortable atmosphere at any time of the day. Updating of engineering systems: Replacement of outdated heating, ventilation and electrical systems to improve the functionality and safety of the premises. Energy-efficient windows and doors: Install modern, insulated windows and doors to reduce energy consumption and increase comfort. You can order from us separately You can order products separately from us. Regardless of whether you need a whole set or just one item, we are happy to offer you a flexible ordering system. Choose what you need and place an order with us Glazing Balcony finishing Built in furniture Bathroom renovation Design project To get a consultation Leave your contacts, we will contact you and be happy to help! pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Your Security Matters to Us Open mobile menu About us Services Contacts Privacy policy This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy. Collection of Information We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and other contact information when you voluntarily provide it to us. We may also collect certain information automatically when you use our services, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system. Use of Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and personalize your experience. We may also use your information for marketing and promotional purposes, but you can opt-out of receiving these communications at any time. Disclosure of Information We may disclose your personal information to third-party service providers who assist us in operating our services or conducting our business. We may also disclose your information in response to legal requests or to protect our rights. Security We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmitting or storing data is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. Children's Privacy Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with their personal information, please contact us immediately. Changes to this Policy We reserve the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to review this policy periodically. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices regarding your personal information, please contact us at flatfix@gmail.com. pages.term-condition: Terms & Conditions - Understand Our Policies Open mobile menu About us Services Contacts Terms of Use Renovation Terms and Conditions for Residential Design and Construction Services Scope of Work: The scope of work includes design services, construction, and renovation work for residential properties. This includes but is not limited to kitchen and bathroom renovations, interior and exterior remodeling, and home additions. Payment Terms: Payment for services rendered must be made in accordance with the agreed upon payment schedule. Any changes to the scope of work may result in additional charges. Design Approval: Clients must approve all design plans and material selections before construction can begin. Any changes or revisions to the approved plans may result in delays and additional costs. Subcontractors: The company may hire subcontractors to perform certain aspects of the renovation work. These subcontractors will be supervised by the company and must adhere to the same quality standards. Permits and Inspections: The company will obtain all necessary permits for the renovation work and ensure that all work meets building codes and regulations. Clients are responsible for any fines or penalties resulting from work done without proper permits. Warranty: The company offers a warranty on all renovation work performed, which covers defects in materials and workmanship. Clients must report any issues within a reasonable timeframe to qualify for repairs under the warranty. Change Orders: Any changes to the scope of work must be documented in a change order and approved by both parties before work can continue. Additional charges may apply for changes requested by the client. Termination: Either party may terminate the agreement at any time with written notice. Clients are responsible for paying for any work completed up to the termination date. If you have any questions or concerns about this information, please contact us at flatfix@gmail.com. 63, Hanuman Gali, Sitabuldi, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440012, India +91 98765 42115 Monday to Saturday 08:00–23:00; Sunday 10:00–22:00 flatfix@gmail.com Our services Apartment Care Interior Design Windows.
